attributes.title: Project Structures
attributes.description: The way we shape our projects

post.html:
TypeScript

node_modules/
  ... ~the weight of the universe~ ...
src/
  ... where we keep our source code ...
package.json
... other files ...















Golang

Its a bit different, but here is a nice way to setup

cmd/
  main.go
pkg/
  export_name/
    thing.go
    ...
  ...
go.mod















Rustlang

src/
  bin/
    binary_1.rs
    binary_2.rs
    ...
  lib.rs
  file_1.rs
  errors.rs
target/
  ... build stuff ...
Cargo.toml # who is tom anyways?

Little note

lib.rs needs to contain all the files you are using.

pub mod file_1.rs
pub mod errors.rs

this way your bin folder can refer to these files.
post.title: Project Structures
